meanings.definition: To take great pride or pleasure in something.
meanings.sent1: She was glorying in her academic achievements.
meanings.sent2: He was glorying in the success of his team.
meanings.sent3: The cat was glorying in catching the elusive mouse.
meanings.sent4: The flowers were glorying in the warmth of the sun.
meanings.sent5: The child was glorying in the beauty of the rainbow.

meanings.definition: To boast or brag about something.
meanings.sent1: He kept glorying about his new car to everyone.
meanings.sent2: She was glorying about her cooking skills at the party.
meanings.sent3: The peacock was glorying about its colorful feathers.
meanings.sent4: The politician was glorying about his upcoming speech.
meanings.sent5: The student was glorying about acing the test.

meanings.definition: To revel or delight in something.
meanings.sent1: The children were glorying in the snowfall, building snowmen.
meanings.sent2: She was glorying in the music, dancing without a care.
meanings.sent3: The puppy was glorying in the attention it received at the park.
meanings.sent4: The audience was glorying in the thrilling performance on stage.
meanings.sent5: The family was glorying in the delicious meal they had cooked together.
